name: Card-Again: Anime Showdown
description:
For the best experience I reccommend the PC or Mobile versions :) 

Introducing the ultimate card game for anime fans! In this exciting game, players must call out a category and compare the values on their cards to determine who is the winner of each round. With a vibrant anime theme, each card represents a popular anime series and features unique characters and values. The goal is to strategically play your cards and outwit your opponents to emerge victorious. Whether you're a seasoned card game veteran or just getting started, this game offers endless fun and excitement for players of all skill levels. So why wait? Grab your deck and get ready to battle in the world of anime!

Play against up to 3 computer-controlled opponents!

Rules:

  • The game starts with a shared deck of cards, with each card representing a different anime series. 
  • Players draw four cards from the shared deck to form their starting hand.
  • Players take turns calling out a category, such as "most episodes" or "oldest anime".
  • Each player then selects a card from their hand and places it face up on the table.
  • The values on the cards are compared and the player with the highest value in the chosen category wins the round.
  • The winning player collects all the played cards and adds them to their winning deck.
  • If there is a tie, the cards are placed in a separate "pot" deck. The winner of the next round will also win the pot deck.
  • At the end of each round, players draw a card from the shared deck if there are any cards remaining.
  • The game continues until the players run out of cards in their hands.
  • The player with the most cards in their winning deck at the end of the game is declared the winner.
